name: Don't blame you
description:
Is he really to blame for everything? what are your conclusions?
unravel this mystery in a first-person game with a dark environment and pixelated graphics in the style of first generation 3D games
With Henry as the protagonist, a young adult who was abandoned by his family and tries to survive alone in the face of financial problems and mental disorders.
The game has mechanics to solve puzzles, explore and find items and notes to unravel the story.
  • The game focuses on solving puzzles and riddles,
  • Decipher Henry's story
  • in a scary environment in first person explore
  • Find items and crack codes as you follow the story
